ai-cp22:1.1_0: “I’m not ever to ask for a question,
ai-cp22:1.2_0: of the supreme Buddha in front of me.
ai-cp22:2.3_0: Udāyī is one who grows old,
ai-cp22:2.4_0: And who is expert in the ways of being inclusive:
ai-cp22:3.1_0: The King’s agrees to the King.
ai-cp22:3.4_0: who lives off plundering a livelihood and earns a living.
ai-cp22:4.3_0: like the tree grows on the teaching.
ai-cp22:5.1_0: There is no principle for those who see.
ai-cp22:5.3_0: Conscience is hard to give up.
ai-cp22:6.1_0: like water who has gone out.
ai-cp22:7.3_0: he cannot give you any requisites.
ai-cp22:7.4_0: for he is the giver of all gods and men.’
ai-cp22:8.1_0: Having gone to that place, she went to the assembly hall,
ai-cp22:8.2_0: he uttered this statement to his words.
ai-cp22:9.1_0: And where would they pour down?
ai-cp22:9.4_0: I’m now able to give up what can be done.’
ai-cp22:11.1_0: the one who points them out.
ai-cp22:11.2_0: Like a boy by a crow,
ai-cp22:11.4_0: The Lord of the World had prepared.
ai-cp22:12.1_0: having cut the sitting down right there, thinking: ‘After task,’
ai-cp22:12.2_0: having wiped out the four floors.
ai-cp22:12.4_0: She went to the yogied ascetic.’
ai-cp22:13.1_0: if she goes there because of the reason;
ai-cp22:13.3_0: while sitting in the house of a Mother,
ai-cp22:13.4_0: having been rich, they do not scare me.
ai-cp22:14.4_0: he has the intention of Kings.’
ai-cp22:15.3_0: Having seen (that), he sent him off.
ai-cp22:16.3_0: I gave the food and drink
ai-cp22:17.1_0: as I did not teach the great gangster.
ai-cp22:17.2_0: doesn’t teach Dhamma to sensual pleasures.
ai-cp22:17.3_0: of omniscience, and my love of omniscience,
ai-cp22:17.4_0: That’s why the overcoming of kingship.”
